activities:
Hospira, Inc and its subsidiaries (Hospira) will collect personal information related to its employees and job applicantsand on-site visitors in connection with the implementation, administration and management of Hospira's employment and human resources programs and for the management of Hospira's security program. 

Hospira wil also obtain customer data and for adverse medical events patient information as well as website visitor data from individuals who visit Hospira websites.
address: 275 N. Field Drive, Dept. NSEC - Bldg H-1
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: human resources data, customer data, adverse event patient information, contractor data, onsite visitor data and website data.
recoursemech: Cooperation with European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs): also a worldwide Office of Ethics and Compliance (OEC)Helpline available to all employees allowing for anonymous, or not, reporting of complaints.
